short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better viewing experience - changes priority listings to pink so you can scroll past them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of pesky sponsored listings taking up half the search results page? Scroll right past them with this extension that separates priority listings from typical listings. 

- Changes the colour of "priority" listings for easier browsing experience
- Sponsored ads often feature cars that are flawed that sellers are trying to pawn off on you
- AutoTrader.com (US) already has this feature
- Doesn't hide listings so you never miss out on a deal
